SEARCH
Package org.apache.turbine.annotation

Annotationstyp TurbineTool

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public @interface TurbineTool
Annotation to mark fields in modules and actions that require a tool to be injected

  • Erforderliche Elemente - Übersicht

    Erforderliche Elemente
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Erforderliches Element
    Beschreibung
    Class<? extends ApplicationTool>
    value
    Get the class of the tool target to inject

  • Elementdetails

    • value

      Class<? extends ApplicationTool> value
      Get the class of the tool target to inject
      Gibt zurück:
      the class the tool is responsible for
